CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many stages are there in this funnel chart?

SRP.Q: Is the Initiate Checkout stage positioned above or below the Enter Payment Information stage?
SRP.A: The Initiate Checkout stage is positioned {above} the Enter Payment Information stage.

VPR.Q: What pattern does the data reduction follow in this funnel chart?
VPR.A: The data reduction follows a {exponential} pattern.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Add to Wishlist?
VE.A: The value of stage Add to Wishlist is {5343}.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Initiate Checkout?
VE.A: The value of stage Initiate Checkout is {2604}.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Add to Cart?
VE.A: The value of stage Add to Cart is {3273}.

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum value in the funnel chart?
EVJ.A: The stage with the highest value is Visit Product Page, with a value of {7138}.

EVJ.Q: What is the minimum value in the funnel chart?
EVJ.A: The stage with the lowest value is Complete Purchase, with a value of {1627}.

SC.Q: How much did it decrease from stage Visit Product Page to stage Add to Wishlist?
SC.A: Decreased by {1795} Users from stage Visit Product Page to stage Add to Wishlist.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value exceed 4308? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {Visit Product Page} stage has {7138}, the {Add to Wishlist} stage has {5343}.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value fall below 2938? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {Initiate Checkout} stage has {2604}, the {Enter Payment Information} stage has {1897}, the {Complete Purchase} stage has {1627}.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value fall between 2250 and 4308? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {Add to Cart} stage has {3273}, the {Initiate Checkout} stage has {2604}.

NC.Q: Which reduction is greater: from stage Add to Cart to Initiate Checkout, or from stage Visit Product Page to Add to Wishlist?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Visit Product Page} to {Add to Wishlist} is greater.

NC.Q: Which reduction is greater: from stage Enter Payment Information to Complete Purchase, or from stage Add to Wishlist to Add to Cart?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Add to Wishlist} to {Add to Cart} is greater.

NC.Q: Which reduction is the greatest: from stage Add to Cart to Initiate Checkout, from stage Initiate Checkout to Enter Payment Information, or from stage Add to Wishlist to Add to Cart?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Add to Wishlist} to stage {Add to Cart} is the greatest.

MSR.Q: Between which two consecutive stages in the funnel chart is the conversion rate drop the largest?
MSR.A: The largest drop in conversion rate occurs between the {Add to Wishlist} and {Add to Cart} stages.

MSR.Q: Between which two consecutive stages in the funnel chart is the conversion rate drop the smallest?
MSR.A: The smallest drop in conversion rate occurs between the {Enter Payment Information} and {Complete Purchase} stages.
